item.title: The CUBE Virtual Reality Immersion
item.description: arXiv:2512.05280v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: The purpose of this note is to introduce the CUBE, a virtual reality immersion that was developed to help visualize electromagnetic fields, particularly the less familiar radiation fields students typically encounter in upper level physics courses. We discuss the pedagogical motivation for different features found in the software, and provide a brief overview of its use.
item.dc:creator: Laura Estridge, Joel Franklin
